subject: Baseball
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees will arrive in Boston with a six-and-a-half-game lead in the A.L. East, after leaving Seattle and Oakland with a 5-2 record.
snippet: The Yankees will arrive in Boston with a six-and-a-half-game lead in the A.L. East, after leaving Seattle and Oakland with a 5-2 record.
